config.boringtweaks.fix_baby_biped_entit: Fixes a bug where baby biped entities (ex. Baby Zombies) didn't scale up their hat layer.
config.boringtweaks.hide_invisible_entit: Hides entity eyes when they are invisible. The affected entities are determined by a list.
config.boringtweaks.list_of_entities_wit: List of Entities with Hidden Eyes
The list of entities to be affected by the "Hide Invisible Entity's Eyes" tweak.
config.boringtweaks.change_sound_slider_: Changes the sliders in the "Sound and Music Options" in order help setting the volume.
config.boringtweaks.change_master_volume: When the game's window is focused away, the master volume will be changed to a set value.
config.boringtweaks.target_master_volume: The set value used by the "Change Master Volume While Away" tweak.
config.boringtweaks.strider_easter_egg.t: Adds an easter egg to the Strider mob. It's cosmetic and requires player intervention.
